name: Platformer (Exemplar)
description:
This is the Platformer game that is featured within my Udemy course: Intro to Construct 3 - Build a Platformer.  The course is a project-based introduction to Game Design, featuring the Construct 3 game engine.

This game is the model that we build together while learning the fundamentals of 2D game development with Construct 3.  Don't worry if the example looks a little plain to you: there are plenty of opportunities throughout the course to spice yours up, add additional levels, and more.   You can even play it on the go from your favorite mobile device, so check out the touch controls too!

A valid Construct 3 license is required to complete the course.

This course features freely-available assets, mostly from, your hero and mine, Kenney a.k.a. "Asset Jesus".
